desc: Warlock is next-gen designed wheel lock that can mount on nearly all trailers with easy installation so your ATV can easily be locked down and transported safely. Warlock is built to fit various widths and heights for buggies, side by side, and more.

layout.text:
WARLOCK
THE NEXT-GEN
ATV WHEEL LOCK

Introducing our stainless steel and aluminum
all-weather ATV wheel lock that fits tires up to
30" height and 12" width with our patent pending
design.
